roleset.name: take
roleset.note: POCKET-V NOTES: Frames file for 'pocket' based on sentences in wsj and automaticexpansion via verbnet. (from pocket.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: corrupt judge
example.text: One former bailiff charged that [the judge]-1 double-crossed him by *trace*-1 reneging on a promise of a better paying job after *trace*-1 pocketing a $500 bribe.
